title: Anyone started using Lolmanager yet?

embed.description: Have you ever dreamt of managing your own professional eSports team? Well, now you can! You will first have to create a team and name your five starter players. From there on you will be able to design your strategy, train, buy and sell your players.

body:
Hey! Hello! Hi!

Just wondering if anyone here has started using lolmanager since it come out? and if anyone plays it what are your thoughts?

Link below if you want to check it out. Id really like to know Oceania's comments.

[LolManager](https://www.lolmanager.gg/ref/YXVQud)
